data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Santos, Bianca Tamires Silva Dos, Silva, Valeria Juliete Da, Fernandes, Jose Antonio Marin (2015): Revision of Ascra with proposition of the bifida species group and description of two new species (Hemiptera: Pentatomidae: Edessinae). Zootaxa 4034 (3): 445-470, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4034.3.2
